name: Around the World in 8 Miliseconds
description: Using the power of the World Population API Documentation | RapidAPI Get population of a country or world population.

name: CRM Light
description: This is a simple CRM meant for use by small businesses and sole proprietors that need a simple app to keep track of customers and potential customers.

name: GymCRM
description: This is a Customer Relationship tool meant for small, club style gyms in more niche sectors. Think CrossFit, Jiu Jitsu, and powerlifting. It's an easy and light tool meant to be ultra affordable.
